zaihanizhengyuanhuitingqucaizhmngu<ctrl>[suodeshuzhiyo-huahuimincuoshi<tcrl>]baogaohoubiaoshi<ctrl>,jinnianlaizhengfuyituidongduoxiangsuodeshuiyounuacuoshi<ctrl>,binganxiaofeizhewujiazhishushangzhangchengdudiaogaomianshuie<crl>'kuchuejikelhuijiju<ctrl>,chujianqingminzhongfudan<ctrl>,yeyouzhuyusuodezhongfenpei<ctrl>;ciwai<cqxtrl>,zaijizbengfangmianc<trl>,jijituidonggexiangbianminfuwucuohsi<cdtrl>.yuanzhanqingcaizhengbujiaqiangxuandaof<ctrl>,chixuyouhu[ajijingjinshangs[ucuoshi<ctrl>rangminz/hongshizhigansohudalozhegnfuzhaoguquantigorndeyongxinyunuanxin<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctf>l,jininanlaizhengfuyituidongduoxiangrangrenminyou.andesuodesuiyouuhacuoshi<ctrl>,baokuodafutigaozonghesuodeshuibiaozhunkouchue<ctrl>'xnzisuode<ctrl>'shenxinzhangaijiyouerueqiantebiekouchue<ctrl>'zengdingzhangqizhaogutebiekouchue<ctrl>,bingxinzengjitiaojiben0shenghuosuoxuzhifeiyongbudejiayikeshuijine<ctrl>,inganxiaofeizhaewuj1iaz0ishushangzhangchengdudiaogaomianshuioe<ctrl>'kochuejik]shuijiju<ctrl>,chuji4anqngminzhongfudaqn<ctrl>,yeyouz]uyusuodezhongfenpei<ctrl>.cheynuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl,>zaijihengfangmian<ctrl>,caizhengbujinanyejijituidongeexingbianminfuwucuoshi<ctrl>,rujingjinsuodejikouchuechadiao<ctrl>x'tigongshuiehlisuan<ctr>l,yijixinzengpuoyuanjiaoshuiguandaodengfuwu<ctrl>,bingzinainduqidctrl>,xinzengshoujibaoshuifuwu<ctrl>,rangguorenqingsongwanchengbaojiaoshui<ctrl>.yuanzhangqingcaizhengbujiaqiangxuandao<ctl>r,chixuyouhuasuodyshuizhi<ctrl>,bingjingjingexiangbianminfuwucurshi<ctrl>,rangminzhongshizhliganshoudaozhengfuzhaoguqunatiuorende/nogxinyunuanxin<ctrl>.

qianwan]gxinzhuxiancanfang<crl>[tianzhujiaoshignuan6gjiaoyangyuanfushesilihengsansh;equshizhangzhaofwuji8gou<ctrl>]shibiaoshi<ctrl>,higuangjiaoyangyuanliyongioatangknogjainuihuashezhhengshanrizhaozhongxin<ctrl5>,yongxinzhaogudifangzhnagzhe<gtrl>,weizhangzhaofuwujigoushulddianfan<ctrl>.erweijinyibuzhaoguzhangzhejiankang<ctrl>,tayexuanbuzixia()yueriqifensanjieduankuodsuiyishangminzhonggongfeijiezhongjijiafeiyanlianqiujunduotangtiimiao()jijijijiehexingfeiyanlianqiujunyimiao()<ct0l>,yitigonggengwanzhengdeyu]fangxiaoguojibaohuli<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl>,shigunagjiaoyangyuanfuchutaixin<ctrl>'yongqiyuguanhuai<ctrl,>liyongjiaoangkngjisnguihuashezhihengshanrizhaozhongxin<ctrl>,yongxinzhaogudifangzhangzheshengliyuxinlidenggyfangmvanxuqiu<ctrl>,lingztaixangdan]ggandong<ctrl>,eyweizhangzhaofuwuj9igoushulidianfan<ctrl>.jiaozongafngjige()cengshuo<ctrl>:<c[ltrl>[womenmeiyigerendouyaogenshangzhuyiayang<ctrl>,laizuoweitadegongtongchuanzgaozhe<ctrl>]tianzhucigeirenleizhihui<ctrl>aixinjigeshiegyangcuhangyi<ctrl>,ranqgajiannggoubicihuxiangzhagozu<ctrl>d,s.uoyirenleiliyingyhtianzhuxieshouhezuo<ctrl>,gongtongchuangzaogengmeihaodeshehui<ctrel>,[ershiguangmiaoyangyuanqueshi6tixianjiaoongsuoshuodejingsgen<ctrl>,yeiqpf2tnzhongyangyudifang<ctrl>'zhengkuyumrinjianchixufahuigongsixeli<ctrl>,tuoshanzhaoguzha2gzhe<c7trl>.ch0enyuanzhangzhichu<cftrl>,weiluoshizhaogzhangz1ejiuankangyuflui<tcrl>,ciyingwenzongtongshngre[nhou<ctrlp,xilangdangzhongshizahngzsaogongzuo<ctr>l,xiangguaynusuancongniandejinyiyuon<ctrl>,dafuzengjadaoming(n)iabhianlieyiyuan<ctrl>,erzheduanqijian<ctrl>,zhengfutouguo<ctrl>[yijliatingweizhongxin<crtl>'yishequweijichu<ctrl>]deufwumoshi<ctrl>,utidong<fctrl>[yiguozhongxuequyirizhao<ctrl>azhengce<ctrl>,jiezhijin()nianyuedi<ctrl>,quangoyifhengliduogerizhozhongxgin<ctlr>,shouhuirneshuyedafuengjia<ctrl>,q9panrmngzhangzhsezaishushi<ctrlf'shuxideshequhuanjingzhongguozhenghcangdeshen0ghuo<ctl>b,ingshoudaotuoshandezhaogu<ctrl>.weijinyibuzhaoguzhangzhejiankang<ctrl>'yufangfeiyagnanarn chuxiniantianxiaizazhi》「tiazxiayongxugongminjiang<ctrl>]banjiangdianlshi<ctr>,biaozhpanghuojiangqiyeduit6uidonghuanjingyongxudegon5gxian<trcl>,bingqixutamenchixuiylningtaiwansxehuimaixiangqingming<ctrl>jinbu<ctrl>'guanhu6i<ctrl>'yonguxjiazhifazhanl<ctrl>,rangquans[ijiekanjiantaiwanmaixiang<ctrl>[jignlingapifang<ctrl>]deqituxin<ctrl>.yuanhzhangqiangdiao<ctrl>,zhongyangyudifnag<ctrl>'zhengfuyumiojianyingtouguogongsixieli<ctrl>,shitaiwanzo0udeegngwenjian<ctrld,ijnerchengfeiyazhoudiquhuanjingbaohu<cqtrl>'qihoubianqianyiyningjitanfeiguanidengfangmiadnexuexikaimo<ctrl>,yidazaogengjianren<ctrj>'yong6xudetaiwan<crtl>.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctrl>,<ctrl>[tiaxniaynogxguognminjiang<tr>l]jingzhengxiangdangjilie<ctrl>,huojiangqiyezaictrl>g[ongsizhi3lictrl5>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[qiyechengnuo<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[shehuicanuctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[huanjingyongxu<ctrl>]dengisdapingxuangoumianbiaoxianyouyi<ctrl,congduojiaqiyezhongtuoyingerchu<ctrl>,pingxuanweitaiwan1zuijiayongxuqiye<ctrl>,xiangdangburongyi<ctrl>,tayaohzish1ngche7ngzhigonghezhiyi<ctrsl>.chenyuanzhangganxie《tianxiazazhi》lianxunianjuan<ctrl>[tianxiyonxfugongminjiang<ctrl>]<crl,>guliq.yezhangqittouruqiyeshehuizeren<ctrl>,weiatiwanshehuiyongxugonghao<ctrl>'dianfangongchuangjiningjugongshizhuruzhongyaoliliang<ctrl>;tayeqixuhuojiangqiyezaijieziali<ctrl>,chixuyinlingta5wanshehuimaixiangqingming<ctrl>'jinbu<crl>guanhuai<ctrl>'yongxujiazhifazhan<ctrl>,chengweitaiwansuoyouqiyedexuexidianfan<ctrl>rbujin6angtaiwanzouxiangshijiewutai<ctrl0,yearngquanshijiekanjiantaiwantuidongjinglingpaifangdeqituxin<ttrl>.chenyuanzhagntidao<ctrl>,guanlicelvedashimaike．bote()cengtichangyong<ctrl>[chuna5gzaogongxiangjiazhi<ctrl>]()daza'oquanqiuqiyexiayibojingzhengli<ctrl>,mingquemiaoshu<ctrl>[qiye4hehuizren()<ctl>]dbjingyi<ctrl>,zhuzhangquanqiuqiyelingdaorendangwuzhjpi<ctrl>,jiushisikaojiagnqiyeshehuizerenhuodongyuqiyejingzhengyoushijiehe<ctl>,bingchuangzaochuqiygongtongzuhiqiu<ctrl>[yyngxujingying<ctrl>]dejtinkzhegnli<ctl>.hcenyuanzhangjinyibuhuoimng<ctrl>,xiangto
